title: Can't use ip in shop
body:
So is there a reason as to why I can't purchase a champion using the ip I've grinded for the past few weeks? I can still use my rp to purchase them, which is like a kick in the face.

Is this one of the many features missing in the "new" and "updated" client?

replies.body: its also happening to me cant buy the 4800 champs even with sufficient ip

I've heard of no known-issues about this. What specifically happens if you trying making a purchase with IP? If you could [**screenshot**](https://gyazo.com/) any errors or visually weird things and send me a link, that would be really helpful!
same problem here, no amount of restarts is fixing it, i can buy champs with RP but not with the IP i've earned, even played a few games to try to get it to reset, still can't purchase.
Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll take a look at what's going on.

I could not click on the purchase with ip option and it was greyed out. I had more than enough to purchase and had the amount for at least 20 hours, so it is not as if the amount still needed to register. After switching to the legacy client I was able to make my purchase with no issues.
Gotcha. If you experiencing this issue again, be sure to hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll take a look at what's going on.
